lead_paragraph: MacCRATE--Robert. We at Brooklyn Legal Services Corporation A mourn the passing of Robert MacCrate, a pillar of the legal community and a dear friend of Brooklyn A for many years. Bob was not just a former President of both the American and New York State Bar Associations, a Senior Partner at the law firm of Sullivan & Cromwell, and a mentor to generations of young lawyers, but a model for us all, devoted to making our system of justice function as such. We were honored to have named our headquarters building in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, not far from the Greenpoint neighborhood where he grew up, the Shriver Tyler MacCrate Center for Justice at a ceremony that he attended with his dear friend Judge Harold Tyler. We will remain forever appreciative of his support for us and for who he was and what he stood for. All our love and regards to his family and many friends. James H.R. Windels, Board Chair Martin S. Needelman & Paul J. Acinapura, Co-Executive Directors 1/3
